title: Combined policies-encourage investment at same PL

content.question: Assume that the economy is at full employment. Policymakers wish to maintain the price level but want to encourage greater investment. Which of the following combinations of monetary and fiscal policies would best achieve this goal?

choices.label: Monetary Policy Fiscal Policy No change Contractionary
Monetary Policy Fiscal Policy Expansionary No change
Monetary Policy Fiscal Policy Expansionary Contractionary
Monetary Policy Fiscal Policy Expansionary Expansionary
Monetary Policy Fiscal Policy Contractionary Expansionary

content.answer: Monetary Policy Fiscal Policy Expansionary Contractionary

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run
